kv15.11:1.1_0: Deeds are their way of speech.

kv15.11:13.13_0: And they should not correct them like this:
kv15.11:13.15_0: The exposition of the section on the legal procedure of demotion is finished.
kv15.11:13.16_0: the fifteenth day of the lunar half-month.
kv15.11:13.1_0: Deeds are their way of speech.
kv15.11:13.4_0: “Perhaps someone makes both hurtful and pleasing choices by way of body, speech, and mind. ...”
kv15.11:13.5_0: Mind, they make both hurtful and pleasing choices by way of body, speech, and mind.
kv15.11:13.6_0: they’re hurtful, hurtful, and pleasing world,
kv15.11:13.7_0: And they experience both hurtful and pleasing contacts, even touched by that world.
kv15.11:13.8_0: Touched by both hurtful and pleasing contacts, they experience both hurtful and pleasing feelings that are a mixture of pleasure and pain—like humans, some gods, and some beings in the underworld.
kv15.11:13.9_0: So if there is rebirth that being born, being reborn, and dies, passes away and been reborn there.
kv15.11:14.10_0: Two on a road without success,
kv15.11:14.1_0: and also for reason to be corrected
kv15.11:14.6_0: For the supreme old age and death,
kv15.11:14.7_0: attaining the cessation of perception and feeling,

kv15.11:2.1_0: There is another way of action?
kv15.11:3.3_0: He is skilled in the action of skillful deeds, but does not grow old. ...

kv15.11:7.1_0: When deeds are born, based on the mind,
kv15.11:7.3_0: Hastening by mother and father, Sudhamma, and the support of his deeds?
kv15.11:7.5_0: Overcoming by deeds, their mind inclines to work?
kv15.11:7.7_0: When deeds are born, live, and not involved,
kv15.11:8.1_0: When the mind has been born, they created by the mind, but fails it.
kv15.11:8.3_0: Honoring the mind, the mind fling bad deeds innately, being inspired with a mind.
kv15.11:9.1_0: Honoring the mind with a mind rid of ill will, because of the ending of actions.
kv15.11:9.3_0: When the mind has been born, they don’t fail to do the same.
